title: The Three little pigs (K)
creator_credit: Paul R. Gagne, Weston Woods Studios and Jan Mack
brief_description: The legendary story of the three pigs and the greedy, scheming wolf comes to glorious “huffing, puffing” life as the wolf tries his best to outsmart the pigs and at last meets his comeuppance. This favourite story features a lively narration by Ian Thompson. Based on the book by Erik Blegvad.
